title: Journey to Heaven
description: Ever wonder what will heaven be like? Jacob Kodesh provides biblical truth, based on years of diligent study, presented in an easy to read format. The illustrations provided about Heaven will excite and surprise you. Journey to Heaven will inspire readers to long for their heavenly experience while they're living on earth.http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00CVMF73U
author: Jacob Kodesh
